name: HenryHall
0:
”Alexa, open Henry Hall”
”Alexa, Ask Henry Hall if there are any announcements”
”Alexa, Ask Henry Hall if I have any packages.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: henry hall
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Please note: A BuildingLink.com account is required to use this skill. 
 
Henry Hall, the innovative, boutique luxury building that delivers a connected, modern living experience.
You can activate Henry Hall by saying "Alexa, open Henry Hall," and ask any of the questions listed below!
 
Alexa, Ask Henry Hall if there are any announcements.
Alexa, Ask Henry Hall if I have any packages.
Alexa, Ask Henry Hall if there are any events in the building today.
Alexa, Ask Henry Hall what the number for the front desk is
Alexa, ask Henry Hall what the leasing office number is.
Alexa, Ask Henry Hall what the Concierge phone number is.
Alexa, ask Henry Hall when the Jam room opens 
Alexa, ask Henry Hall when the gym is open.
Alexa, ask Henry Hall who the interior designer is.
Alexa, Ask Henry Hall what amenities we have in the building? 
 
Disclaimer: This skill may not be suitable for all ages.
